subject: Baseball
Horse Racing
Preakness Stakes
Street Sense (Race Horse)
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: Former Yankee Mickey Rivers picked Street Sense to win the Kentucky Derby and Curlin to take the Preakness, meaning he is going for a personal Triple Crown in the Belmont Stakes.
snippet: Former Yankee Mickey Rivers picked Street Sense to win the Kentucky Derby and Curlin to take the Preakness, meaning he is going for a personal Triple Crown in the Belmont Stakes.
